      • draw

        public abstract void draw​(@NonNull
                          Bitmap bitmap)
        Draws this Drawable's content to the specified Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - A Bitmap

      • setColorFilter

        public void setColorFilter​(ColorFilter colorFilter)
        Sets the color filter to be applied to this Drawable's content for subsequent calls to draw(Bitmap). If null is specified, no filtering will be applied.
        Parameters:
        colorFilter - The color filter to be applied or null if no filter is used.
